EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_ Inaugural Geode Summit_Palo Alto_Q116.Early Bird 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Announcing Geode Summit Agenda & Sponsors
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://geodesummit.com/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=apache-geode-q116]]> Pivotal
3495 Deer Creek Rd
Palo Alto, Ca 94304 Geode Summit has just announced the agenda. Hear from speakers building cutting edge applications with in-memory computing from companies such as Ampool, Capgemini, CIBC, Data Torrent, Murex, zData, and Pivotal.
Select sessions from the agenda include:
- Democratizing Fast Analytics - In-memory Streaming on Hadoop - Combining Stream Processing and In-Memory Data Grids - Real Time Vehicle Telematics - Operational Data Services for Real Time Mobile Experience - Wall St. Derivative Risk Solutions - The Future of Apache Geode
Register today <[[https://2016.event.geodesummit.com/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=apache-geode-q116]]> to secure Early Bird pricing for just $49, the offer expires February 29th!
